question: Who had hits with Go Now and Nights in White Satin?
api_result: "Go Now" was a hit for the band The Moody Blues, and "Nights in White Satin" is also one of their most famous songs. Both songs were part of their early work in the 1960s. "Go Now" was released in 1964, while "Nights in White Satin" was released in 1967.
